name: Coffee Dash (mingy_swingy)
description:
It's Coffee Time!
White Delights, a very famous cafe shop in town, is filled with lots and lots of customers; and you wouldn't let them disappointed, do you?
Wait...
Oh no! The ordering machine is now broken and instead of featuring names, they show numbers!
Calm down, my friend. Just always remember the two numbers, 1 is left, and 2 is the right.
So, are you ready yet?
